Articles.Content:
I have noticed strange behavior of Soyuz descend module: after switching from timerwarp to 1x speed it receives a little torque punch and starts spinning.

After some testing I've concluded that presence of parachute part causes capsule to rotate in situation described. Looks like parts are conflicting somehow in terms of physical interaction.

How could this be fixed?

Thanks is advance.

Yes! I noticed that last night. The pod twitches after coming out of warp and it looked like the parachute was the culprit. The fact that the pod has little to no torque doesn't help either. So what I did was I placed four of the FASA mini-comp reaction wheels in the pod and that nullified it. Still jumps though.

in 22 the Soyuz tma has retro rockets if that helps

and the retro rockets have auto ignition so that they deploy at 7m
